verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit, move among us
Come Holy Spirit
Flow Living Water, flow within us
Flow Living Water

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Your Love is alive,
it's breaking the darkness
It's bringing the Light
to soften the heart of stone
Your Love is alive
and breaking the darkness
It's winning the fight
and bringing the orphan home

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Your love,
it's bringing the light.
Your love,
It's winning the fight

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit, move among us
Come Holy Spirit
O grace divine, burn within us
Come Holy Fire
